title: Valmet in key role to decarbonize Fortum's Zabrze combined heat and power plant in Poland
description: Valmet Oyj's press release, December 3, 2025, at 9:30 a.m. EET ESPOO, Finland, Dec. 3, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Valmet is delivering a boiler fuel conversion for Fortum Zabrze combined heat and power (CHP) plant in Poland. Valmet's delivery for Fortum Zabrze CHP …
